SELECT LODGING_NUMBER, LODGING_LEARNING_LANG, LODGING_TITLE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, LODGING_NUMBER, LODGING_LEARNING_LANG, LODGING_TITLE FROM ( SELECT L.LODGING_NUMBER, L.LODGING_LEARNING_LANG, L.LODGING_TITLE FROM TBL_LODGING L LEFT JOIN TBL_LODGING_ANSWER A ON L.LODGING_NUMBER = A.LODGING_NUMBER WHERE A.LODGING_NUMBER IS NULL ORDER BY L.LODGING_NUMBER DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE R > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}
